title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Cereal Seed)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Cereal Seed) 

(Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (cereal seed) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 2. The European Union (Cereal Seed) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 217 of
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Cereal Seed) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 217 of 
2013) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the definition of 
“Directive” (as amended by the European Union (Cereal Seed) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 197 of 2020)) the following: 
“‘Directive’ means Council Directive 66/402/EEC of 14 June 19662 (as amended 
by Council Directive 69/60/EEC of 18 February 19693, Council Directive 
71/162/EEC of 30 March 19714, Council Directive 72/274/EEC of 20 July 
19725, Council Directive 72/418/EEC of 6 December 19726, Council Directive 
73/438/EEC of 11 December 19737, Council Directive 75/444/EEC of 26 June 
19758, Council Directive 78/55/EEC of 19 December 19779, Council Directive 
78/692/EEC of 25 July 197810, Commission Directive 79/641/EEC of 27 June 
197911, Council Directive 79/692/EEC of 24 July 197912, Council Directive 
86/155/EEC of 22 April 198613, Commission Directive 86/320/EEC of 20 June 
198614, Commission Directive 87/120/EEC of 14 January 198715, Council 
Directive 88/380/EEC of 13 June 198816, Council Directive 90/654/EEC of 4 
December 199017, Council Directive 96/72/EC of 18 November 199618, Council 
Directive 98/95/EC of 14 December 199819, Council Directive 98/96/EC of 14

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2021/415 by amending the definitions contained in Directive 
66/402/EEC as they relate to the botanic names given to certain varieties of hard 
fescue and couch grass together with names of wheat, durum wheat, spelt wheat, 
sorghum and Sudan grass.
